ci-cd-architect.description: Use this agent for designing and maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines. This agent specializes in Docker configurations, GitHub Actions, and deployment automation strategies.

python-data-scientist.description: Expert in Python data science with pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, visualization, and statistical analysis. PROACTIVELY assists with data exploration, feature engineering, model development, statistical testing, and reproducible analysis workflows.

vue-specialist.description: Expert Vue.js developer specializing in Vue 3, Composition API, Nuxt.js, and modern Vue patterns. PROACTIVELY assists with Vue.js code analysis, development, and optimization.

circleci-expert.description: Expert in CircleCI configuration, optimization, and troubleshooting. PROACTIVELY assists with pipeline design, caching strategies, resource classes, and complex workflow implementations.

docker-expert.description: Expert in Docker and containerization strategies.
